ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Pet commands
ygData.msgSnippet: My charm pallette has: ... =========== attk is a social that is /pet attack who is a social that is 3 lines: /pet who leader /pet back off /time The who
ygData.messageBody:
My charm pallette has:

===========
||selos||--||sirens||
===========
||attk||--|| who ||
===========
||sense||--||track||
===========

attk is a social that is /pet attack
who is a social that is 3 lines:
/pet who leader
/pet back off
/time

The 'who' social covers 3 bases: tells group i have a pet ("My leader is
Sylly"), calms a pet that is frenzied on a group member, and shows me the
time of day for hunting in kithikor (actually I use this to get ToD - pet or
no pet.)

Selos is the secret to successful charming. Play selos all the time.
Selos, charm, then right back to selos. Remember that you can cast charm
while moving - use this power to your advantage. Avoid getting smooshed.

Sense is sense heading and track is tracking.

Sylly Songsynger
<The Pantheon>
Bardette of 49 songs
... somewhere on Innoruuk
http://www.sba.uwm.edu/jgs/sylly


> From: "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...>
>
> This isn't strictly a bard question, but it's not irrelevant either, so...
>
> What pet commands do you folks find yourselves using most often? I'm
trying
> to arrange hot keys for one of my alts & I'm trying to use as few of them
as
> possible.
>
> Thanks
> Evulia
